Generation I.Red: Under a full moon, this Pok é mon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Under a full moon, this Pok é mon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
Generation I.Yellow: A Gengar is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.
Generation I.Stadium: Appears to attack people who get lost in the mountains. Said to be the culprit behind shadows that laugh in the moonlight.

Generation II.Gold: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a Gengar appeared.
Generation II.Silver: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
Generation II.Crystal: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a Gengar appeared. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
Generation III.Sapphire: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
Generation III.Emerald: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
Generation III.FireRed: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
Generation III.LeafGreen: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar 's doing.

Generation IV.Diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F .
Generation IV.Pearl: Lurking in the shadowy corners of rooms, it awaits chances to steal its prey's life force.
Generation IV.Platinum: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It steals heat from its surroundings. If you feel a sudden chill, it is certain that a Gengar appeared.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

Generation V.Black: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
Generation V.White: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
Generation V.Black 2: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.
Generation V.White 2: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.

Generation VI.X: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VI.Y: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

Generation VII.Sun: Gengar's relationships are warped. It has no interest in opponents unless it perceives them as prey.
Generation VII.Moon: The energy of Mega Evolution awakened it. It sinks into another dimension, where it keeps a patient watch for its chance to attack.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It tries to take the lives of anyone and everyone. It will even try to curse the Trainer who is its master!
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Mega Evolution has made it possible for Gengar to access other dimensions. Its entire body is brimming with strange power.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: It can pass through other dimensions and appear anywhere. It caused a stir one time when it stuck just one leg out of a wall.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: It can pass through other dimensions and appear anywhere. It caused a stir one time when it stuck just one leg out of a wall.

Generation VIII.Sword: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar's doing.
Generation VIII.Shield: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It hides in shadows. It is said that in rooms where Gengar is hiding, the temperature drops by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Lurking in the shadowy corners of rooms, it awaits chances to steal its prey's life-force.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take hold of a protective charm posthaste!

Generation IX.Scarlet: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
Generation IX.Violet: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
